attributes.action: make HM Government pay the CIFAS registration fee for all parents in the country who's financial details have been lost by HMRC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the shocking failure of HRMC staff to securely handle the finanical details of all Child Benefit recipients, I feel that HM Goverment should pay the £11.75 for each of us to register with CIFAS, the fraud prevention service.

Paying our registration fee is the least that they can do for putting our details in grave danger of misuse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
